login.welcome: Welcome back to the Onvi business!

register.terms: By clicking the “Register” button, you accept the terms
register.other: Other Onvi-business users will know you by this name.
register.after: After registration, our manager will contact you and answer all questions about the system

forgot.enter: Enter your Email registered on the site and we will send a code to recover your password
forgot.please: Please create a new password that only you will know.

warehouse.nomenclature: You don't have nomenclature in the program
warehouse.purposeUse: Purpose of use of goods: for sale to customers or to be written off as consumables
warehouse.importing: Importing goods from XLS files directly into the program
warehouse.xls: XLS, XLSX not more than 25 MB.
warehouse.download: Download the template, fill in with your information and upload it into the system
warehouse.toAvoid: To avoid errors, the data in the table should occupy strictly its own columns.
warehouse.useCorr: Use the correct input format for each field type.
warehouse.supp: Supported table formats: XLS, XLSX. Size - no more than 25 MB.
warehouse.downloadTemp: Download the template by clicking on the button to the right
warehouse.fill: Fill in the template with customer data
warehouse.uploadTemp: Upload the completed template to the field below
warehouse.noDataGroups: You haven't created any nomenclature groups.
warehouse.noOverhead: There are no records of goods receipt in the program
warehouse.noSupply: You don't have vendor data in the program
warehouse.noStock: You don't have any products on stock

marketing.noClient: At the moment you have no clients in the system
marketing.name: Client name
marketing.during: During the entire period of participation
marketing.promotion: The “Promotion Constructor” section will allow you to comprehensively set up conditions for automatically assigning levels to clients, on which the privilege in the form of bonuses or discounts will depend.
marketing.setup: Set up a Branch/Car Wash to participate in the BP
marketing.setUpAcc: Set up the rules for accruing, writing off and burning bonuses
marketing.rules: Rules for the validity of a gift for the number of visits
marketing.setUpBranch: Set up the branch where the Program will operate.
marketing.branchCan: A branch can participate in only one launched loyalty program
marketing.price: Price for service and number of visits
marketing.amount: The amount of purchases and the number of visits is displayed after the client registers in the Program.
marketing.based: Based on these data levels are calculated
marketing.take: Take into account the purchase of related products
marketing.addCost: Add the cost of related products to the amount
marketing.when: When calculating, the part of the amount paid with bonuses is not taken into account
marketing.bonuses: Bonuses from the nearest expiration date are written off first
marketing.minus: Bonus account does not go into minus
marketing.whenRet: When returning related products, bonuses are returned
marketing.to: To manually write off and accrue bonuses, go to the buyer's card
marketing.cal: Calculated from the date of accrual
marketing.whenCal: When calculating bonuses, round up to a larger whole number.
marketing.whenWrit: При списании также используется только целые бонусы.
marketing.max: Maximum write-off percentage for payment with bonuses
marketing.no: Number of bonuses to be written off from the final price after all discounts
marketing.allow: Allow bonuses to be written off for payment with any discounts
marketing.set: Set the minimum cost if you need the total cost on the receipt to not be zero
marketing.bonusesCan: Bonuses can be burned out completely, partially, or remain active forever. Set up rules for the combustion period
marketing.after: After starting the Program, combustion conditions cannot be changed
marketing.create: Create multiple levels with different privileges.
marketing.toMan: To manually assign levels to clients, go to the client card
marketing.you: You can set privileges for one level
marketing.retain: Retain customers with payment benefits services, depending on the degree of their participation
marketing.award: Award bonuses for services, motivate them to come back to you
